Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CRIME VICTIMS, CRIME AND CORRECTION

Title: Requires at least one member of the state board of parole be a formerly incarcerated person
Summary: Relates to requiring at least one member of the state board of parole be a formerly incarcerated person.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the executive law, in relation to requiring at least one member of the state board of parole be a formerly incarcerated person
